abstract: ThinkProgress announces it will unionize with Writers Guild of America, East; is latest digital media outlet to unionize, joining website like Gawker, Vice and Salon.
lead_paragraph: ThinkProgress, a news website with “progressive values,” will join Gawker, Vice and others in organizing to secure better pay and working conditions.

headline.main: ThinkProgress to Unionize With Writers Guild of America
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; ThinkProgress News Site Unionizes With Writers Guild

snippet: ThinkProgress, a news website with “progressive values,” will join Gawker, Vice and others in organizing to secure better pay and working conditions.
